page.title: 03A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: I get up at about{8.30}on Thursday.Mum shouts down the stairs for me to get up.Eventually I drag myself out of bed.I get dressed,wash myself,comb my hair and get my things ready for school.Mum{drives}me to school at 9 o'clock.I am usually a bit late but I was not today.We had number maths.Meriel and I played{'Grannys {Garden'}on the computer.We played football on the field.I was in defence.After morning play we have lessons then lunch.Then we have play again.After school I go riding.I enjoy it very much.My favourite pony is called{Firefly}.I go home and have supper.I go to bed at 9 o'clock,read for a bit then go to sleep.
